pages.text: If you have broken a crucible or used a soul extraction rune, you probably noticed a cloud of taint floating above the ground. While it fades after a bit, it is important to be aware of its effects and properties. Standing in a cloud of taint will give you two potion effects.

While the Poison effect is normal, Wavering Soul is more interesting, as it will kill any creature that drops to half a heart of health while under its effects. Anything killed by Wavering Soul in this way will drop a Solidified Tear.
